criteria.method: SBOM/provenance verification + property test suite on live API
TLS cipher scan + test vector verification + invalid-proof rejection testing
External-signing flow validation with software KMS substitute
Quorum enforcement validation at verification boundary
30 cross-network transfers with retry injection and RPC outage simulation
RBAC testing with Viewer vs Operator principals + key rotation
Structured log verification + metrics endpoint scraping
Region policy enforcement testing with disallowed regions and sinks
FIPS mode verification + SBOM/provenance attestation checking

details.note: Testing atomic swap latency as per FinP2P requirements

criteria.method: 10-minute open-loop load test with step rates (1,2,4,8 rps)
24-hour synthetic canary (1 op/5 min) with alert on failure
Tracing + structured logging + metrics + dashboard building
Process kill/restart testing during idle and mid-transfer states
Minor upgrade + rollback testing with backward compatibility validation
